templates.template:
<xf:macro name="common_options" arg-field="!" arg-supportsRequired="{{ true }}" arg-supportsUserEditable="{{ false }}" arg-supportsEditableOnce="{{ false }}" arg-supportsModeratorEditable="{{ false }}" arg-supportsGroupEditable="{{ false }}" arg-supportsGroupViewable="{{ false }}">
<xf:checkboxrow hideempty="true"> <xf:if is="$supportsRequired"> <xf:option name="required" selected="$field.required">{{ phrase('field_is_required') }}</xf:option> </xf:if> <xf:if is="$supportsUserEditable"> <xf:option name="user_editable" value="yes" selected="$field.user_editable != 'never'" label="{{ phrase('user_editable') }}">
<xf:checkbox> <xf:if is="$supportsEditableOnce"> <xf:option name="user_editable" value="once" selected="$field.user_editable == 'once'">{{ phrase('editable_only_once') }}</xf:option> </xf:if> </xf:checkbox> </xf:option> </xf:if> <xf:if is="$supportsModeratorEditable"> <xf:option name="moderator_editable" selected="$field.moderator_editable">{{ phrase('moderator_editable') }}</xf:option> </xf:if> </xf:checkboxrow>
<xf:if is="$supportsGroupEditable"> <xf:macro template="helper_user_group_edit" name="checkboxes" arg-label="{{ phrase('editable_by_user_groups') }}" arg-id="editable_user_group" arg-selectedUserGroups="{{ $field.field_id ? $field.editable_user_group_ids : [-1] }}" /> </xf:if>
<xf:if is="$supportsGroupViewable"> <xf:macro template="helper_user_group_edit" name="checkboxes" arg-label="{{ phrase('sxfcore_viewable_by_user_groups') }}" arg-id="viewable_user_group" arg-selectedUserGroups="{{ $field.field_id ? $field.viewable_user_group_ids : [-1] }}" /> <xf:formrow explain="{{ phrase('sxfcore_viewable_by_user_groups_explain') }}" /> </xf:if> </xf:macro>

<xf:title>{{ phrase('admin_navigation.sxfcorecomponents') }}</xf:title>
<xf:form action="{{ link('sxfcorecomponents/toggle') }}" ajax="true" class="block block-container"> <xf:datalist> <xf:foreach loop="{$components}" value="$component"> <tbody class="dataList-rowGroup"> <xf:datarow rowtype="subsection" rowclass="dataList-row--noHover"> <xf:cell>{$component.title}</xf:cell>
<xf:cell href="{{ link('sxfcorecomponents/components') }}" overlay="true"> {{ phrase('sxfcore_dependent_components:') }} {{ $component.component_dependencies ? $component.component_dependencies.count() : '0' }} </xf:cell>
<xf:cell href="{{ link('sxfcorecomponents/add-ons') }}" overlay="true"> {{ phrase('sxfcore_dependent_addons:') }} {{ $component.addon_dependencies ? $component.addon_dependencies.count() : '0' }} </xf:cell>
<xf:if is="!{$component.error}"> <xf:toggle name="enabled[{$component.component_id}]" selected="{$component.enabled}" class="dataList-cell--separated" submit="true" tooltip="{{ phrase('enable_disable_x', {'title': $component.title}) }}" /> </xf:if> </xf:datarow>
<xf:datarow> <xf:cell colspan="4">{$component.description}</xf:cell> </xf:datarow>
<xf:if is="{$component.error}"> <xf:datarow> <xf:cell colspan="4">{$component.error|raw}</xf:cell> </xf:datarow> </xf:if> </tbody> </xf:foreach> </xf:datalist> </xf:form>

{$fieldDefinition.title}
{$field} {{ phrase('sxfcore_no_permission_view_value_this_field') }} {$field} {$field} {$field} {$field} {{ phrase('sxfcore_the_user_has_forbidden_to_view_this_information') }}

<xf:macro name="gender" arg-user="!"> <xf:selectrow name="sxfcore_gender" label="{{ phrase('sxfcore_gender') }}" value="{$user.sxfcore_gender}"> <xf:option value="">{{ phrase('no_selection') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="male">{{ phrase('sxfcore_gender_male') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="female">{{ phrase('sxfcore_gender_female') }}</xf:option> </xf:selectrow> </xf:macro>
